//scripts.build: Runs all code generation and uses the typescript compiler to build the application.
//scripts.start: Starts the application, the build command must be executed first.
//scripts.generate: Runs all the code generation commands, for convenience.
//scripts.generate:prisma: Runs Prisma's code generation, which produces types from the schema.prisma file. These types are then located in the @prisma/client package directory.
//scripts.generate:nexus: Runs Nexus' code generation, which produces the graphql schema from the Nexus schema definition.
//scripts.generate:proto: Runs the protobuf code generation, which produces types for gRPC communications.
//scripts.prisma:push: Pushes the current state of the Prisma schema to the connected database, defined in the schema.prisma file.
//scripts.prisma:studio: Starts the Prisma UI for viewing and editing data from the database.
//scripts.docker:build: Builds the Docker image of the application.
//scripts.docker:run: Runs the Docker image of the application, the docker:build command must be executed first.

scripts.generate: npm run generate:prisma && npm run generate:nexus && npm run generate:proto
